ygData.subject: The Shadows of Luclin
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail, all, I m new here... I have a level 16 Barbarian Shaman and a level 17 Wood Elf Druid on the Nameless Server. I ve enjoyed reading through the posts
ygData.messageBody:
Hail, all, I'm new here... I have a level 16
Barbarian Shaman and a level 17 Wood Elf Druid on the
Nameless Server. I've enjoyed reading through the posts
here. I've had to suspend my EQ account for a couple of
months and I'm going through HORRIBLE EverQuest
withdrawals, lol (this should be remedied fairly soon, thank
God)! I've been surfing EQ websites for an EQ fix, and
I ran across info on the new expansion that's due
at the end of the year; it seems really incredible.
The idea of Norrath having a habitable moon is really
terrific. Since I haven't been able to log on, I'm
wondering what people are saying about it. Is there any
controversy? I haven't seen the subject discussed here and I'm
wondering what you all think. Have you checked out the
screenshots and everything? If not, take a look-see at this
site:<br><br><a href=http://everquest.station.sony.com/luclin/ target=new>http://everquest.station.sony.com/luclin/</a><br>From the site:<br>"EverQuest∩┐╜: The Shadows of Luclin∩┐╜,
projected to be available in December 2001, expands the
EverQuest universe yet again and is poised to provide some
mind blowing enhancements and additions to the current
game!<br><br>*Eerie moonscape reveals over 25 new adventure zones
including a new starting city<br>*All new, highly detailed
player-character models<br>*Massively enhanced 3D graphics
engine<br>*Introducing an all-new player character race: The Vah Shir
(Kerrans)<br>*And an all-new player character class: The
Beastlord<br>*Additional non-level-based advancement options for those at
level 60<br>*Discover challenging new quests, items to
trade and sell, NPCs and more!"<br><br>What's your
opinion on the new graphics that are to be implemented?
Do you think, as I do, that even though they are
much more detailed, that they look, hmm how should I
say this∩┐╜ more cartoon-like than the graphics we have
now? I'm not sure if I like that∩┐╜ Do you like the
character models of the high elf and the gnome (the high
elf princess' eyes are even blinking, wow!) I love
the idea of being able to personalize the faces of my
characters, and the Vah Shir sound really cool. Just
wondering what everyone is saying about all this
=)<br><br>Jones-ing in California,<br>Jamilie Rainspirit<br>16th
Barbarian Shaman, The Nameless Server
